sourcesContent:
Venta de Medicamento

Medicamento ID: {{ medicamentId }}

Total: {{ totalPurchase }}

import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { ApiService } from '../service/api.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-sell-modal', templateUrl: './sell-modal.component.html', styleUrls: ['./sell-modal.component.css'] }) export class SellModalComponent { @Input() medicamentId: number; unitQuantity: number; totalPurchase: number; modalVisible: boolean; constructor(private apiService: ApiService) { this.medicamentId = 0; this.unitQuantity = 0; this.totalPurchase = 0; this.modalVisible = false; } calculateTotal() { const url = `http://localhost:8091/api/sale/get_unit_price/${this.medicamentId}`; this.apiService.getUnitPrice(url).subscribe( (price: number) => { this.totalPurchase = price * this.unitQuantity; }, (error) => { console.log(error); } ); } sellMedicament() { //const url = `http://localhost:8090/api/medicament/${this.medicamentId}`; this.modalVisible = true; } }
